item.title: Comment on Secondary Division Orientation: June 7 by Sam Pierce
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/secondary-division-student-family-orientation-2020/#comment-1384">Sumprt99</a>.
We've just set a premiere time of noon. Bookmark our YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B1NM3FNZ57M to tune in!
Note that your instructor may also have their own Zoom orientation meeting that they have scheduled separately.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sumprt99.

We’ve just set a premiere time of noon. Bookmark our YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B1NM3FNZ57M to tune in!

Note that your instructor may also have their own Zoom orientation meeting that they have scheduled separately.

item.title: Comment on Get ready for application season! by Sam Pierce
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/get-ready-for-application-season/#comment-1368">Lori Randolph</a>.
Hi Lori! We always aim to have it up and running no later than January 1. Often it'll go live a few weeks earlier. You can join our community newsletter (/news/) if you haven't already, and you can also follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/ucb.atdp). Either will alert you as soon as the process is officially open!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Lori Randolph.

Hi Lori! We always aim to have it up and running no later than January 1. Often it’ll go live a few weeks earlier. You can join our community newsletter (/news/) if you haven’t already, and you can also follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/ucb.atdp). Either will alert you as soon as the process is officially open!

item.title: Comment on Math Placement Testing (Update: Make-up Dates Available) by Sam Pierce
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/math-placement-testing-2017/#comment-1335">emgug</a>.
Placement tests are only for the listed courses, which are all Secondary Division.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to emgug.

Placement tests are only for the listed courses, which are all Secondary Division.

item.description: Is this placement test required for ED or SD only?

item.title: Comment on Elementary Division deadlines approach! by Jashmin Pandey
item.dc:creator: Jashmin Pandey
item.description: Jashmin Pandey has been an outstanding and high performing student in my Integrated Mathematics 1 class. She has been high performing student, consistent in turning in all assignment on time, and an active participant in classroom. I strongly recommend Jashmin to join this summer program.
item.content:encoded:
Jashmin Pandey has been an outstanding and high performing student in my Integrated Mathematics 1 class. She has been high performing student, consistent in turning in all assignment on time, and an active participant in classroom.
I strongly recommend Jashmin to join this summer program.
